title: Paging Dr. Peacock
description: When Troy Peacock’s next patient of the day turns out to be the hottest, hunkiest man he’s laid eyes on in years, it’s all he can do not to stare. Unfortunately for Troy, being a doctor means he’s stuck keeping a professional distance between them, despite those tantalizing abs. But Warren has his eye on Troy, and he’s determined to make the good doctor forget all about his Hippocratic oaths. Troy might not want to violate his doctor/patient confidentiality, but his patient has other ideas … and if Warren has his way, Troy’s going to end up prescribing a relationship...
author: Cassandra Corbin
